title: T213-2 Gandil, Tinker (Feds) and McGraw available - SOLD!

posts.post_title: T213-2 Gandil, Tinker (Feds) and McGraw available - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
All three are technically low grade but very attactive examples.  Each has a wrinkle or two, but none break the surface of the card.  No other wear aside from that, each has terrific color and the backs are entirely clean and damage free -- 

t213-2 Gandil FR/GD - wrinkling --- $150
t213-2 Tinker (Chicago - Federal League) GD - wrinkling --- $135 
t213-2 McGraw GD -wrinkling --- $90 

*** Cards are now sold, thanks!


Brian
